imdb.plot outline: After being left with his girlfriend's dog and kicked out of his mother's house, clueless yet likable 30-year-old Sang Kim, now needs to rely on the help of his new found companion dog Phoebe, a weirdly smart homeless person named Thoth and his new quirky colleagues from the dog facility "Walkie Buddies".
imdb.title: Walkie Buddies
plot: Underachiever 30-year-old Sang Kim's world is being shaken after being left with his girlfriend's dog and being kicked out of his mother's house.::Anonymous

After being left with his girlfriend's dog and kicked out of his mother's house, clueless yet likable 30-year-old Sang Kim, now needs to rely on the help of his new found companion dog Phoebe, a weirdly smart homeless person named Thoth and his new quirky colleagues from the dog facility "_Walkie Buddies_ (qv)".::Anonymous

The story evolves around Sang who is a lost soul who still lives at home at the age of 30. After being kicked out of the house and left with his girlfriend's dog, he needs to face responsibility for the first time. Surprisingly he finds hope and encouragement through the handy ship of a pomeranian.::Anonymous
